div.p: ... page ... ¹⁄₆₄ aruras. ... page 154 ¼⅛¹⁄₆₄ aruras. ... page 153 ½ ¼⅛¹⁄₁₆¹⁄₆₄ aruras. ... of the monks, as follows: 1st page 181 aruras. 2nd page 153 ½¼⅛¹⁄₃₂ aruras. 3rd page 152 ¼⅛¹⁄₁₆ aruras. 4th page 58 ½¼¹⁄₃₂ aruras.
Through the pakton of Abdallah ... Altogether, ... aruras. Through the church ... Through the topoi of the same ... Total 32½ aruras. Translation: N. Gonis, P.Harr. 3 307
